creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: scene of various sailboats moored in a harbor from high vantage point; hint of seaside buildings at LL; rocky bluffs in background
marks:
Signature, Date, and Mark 

 LRC, in pencil: [F. Yoshida 1932]
title: Sailboats in Harbor
